channel.title: Axivation 718/745+ | Iron Man | Vorago | Solomans | 24/7 |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2cr11kl.png[/img]
Axivation is a server that is willing to strive though struggle and reach its highest potential at all times. We have daily updates for the players to enjoy and new content is always being added. Suggestions are always welcome so please don't hesistate to let us know on the forums. We try to offer a wide range of features within Axivation to cater to everyones needs. We not only have bosses and pvp but we aim to satisfy the skillers amongst you aswell and will not stop until everything is perfect! If you want a server that has dedicated staff, hard working developers and a great helpful community this is the server for you. Axivation is hosted on a Dedicated Virtual Private Server DDOS Protected and is online 24/7 with no Downtime.
[u] Features [/u] 718/745, 100% Working Skills, 100% Working Bosses, Vorago almost perfect match to rs3, Perfect Nex, Blink, Rise Of The Sixth with fantastic rewards, Perfect KBD, Perfect Kalphite Queen, Perfect Bork, Perfect Dag Kings, Perfect Tormented Demons, All God Wars Bosses Work 100%, Barrelchest, Glacors, Group Bossing Including Queen Black Dragon, Wyld Wurm, Yk'lagor The Thunderous, Party Demon, All Dungeons Working Perfect And Filled With Monsters, Huge List Of Slayer Teleports And A Group Of Slayer Masters To Choose From, A Huge List Of 15 Minigames to pick from Barrows, Fight Kiln, Fight Jad, Clan Wars, Soul Wars, Duel Arena, Dominion Tower, Fist Of Guthix, Pest Control.. And Many More. Custom Interface To Teleport To Traning Zones From Low Level Zones to High Level Zones, From Easy soloable Bosses To Hard Multi Player Bosses, PVP Teleports, Donator Zones With Special Shops, Amazing Xp Rates Perfect For Any Pvmer Or Pker, Global Dueling, Duel Anywhere!
Links: Website - [url=http://axivation.co.uk/]Axivation[/url] Forums - [URL=http://axivation.co.uk/forums/]Axivation[/URL] Highscores - [URL=http://axivation.co.uk/highscores/]Axivation - Highscores[/URL] Play now - [URL=http://"http://axivation.co.uk/Axivation%20Client.jar"]http://axivation.co.uk/Axivation%20Client.jar[/URL]
[SPOILER=Images] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/34rgmdl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/b4tde0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/flyqo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2j60ffd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/30lgp5f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/2urxac8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/68e9mt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/333ahrl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2czbuid.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/25svgg5.jpg[/img]
Solomans: Smithing [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/egomrp.gif[/img] Cooking [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/ejgcy8.gif[/img] Crafting [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/j7ut5c.gif[/img] Mining [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/mw6qfa.gif[/img] Woodcutting [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2ni5rpc.gif[/img]
[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Axivation 718/745+ | Iron Man | Vorago | Solomans | 24/7 |
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

Virtu:

Bump. You won’t regret joining!

Shitty server. Was working for Virtu (a.k.a) Chris Allen for a bit. Things were going good.
After a couple weeks of providing paid services, his team had fucked everything up over and over.
I have stopped providing services to Chris due to lack of respect, and cleaning up a bunch of copy and pasters code gets annoying. Now that I have left he is spamming my advert threads. Due to harassment and not following through on the payment for the last patch I have decided to release Axivation, as I have been the only one to really do anything to the source. Be sure to be on the lookout within the next couple hours.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Virtu Virtu
item.description:
@Virtu wrote:

[CENTER]

2cr11kl.png728×90

Axivation is a server that is willing to strive though struggle and reach its highest potential at all times.
We have daily updates for the players to enjoy and new content is always being added.
Suggestions are always welcome so please don’t hesistate to let us know on the forums.
We try to offer a wide range of features within Axivation to cater to everyones needs.
We not only have bosses and pvp but we aim to satisfy the skillers amongst you aswell and will not stop until everything is perfect!
If you want a server that has dedicated staff, hard working developers and a great helpful community this is the server for you.
Axivation is hosted on a Dedicated Virtual Private Server DDOS Protected and is online 24/7 with no Downtime.

Features
718/745, 100% Working Skills, 100% Working Bosses,
Vorago almost perfect match to rs3, Perfect Nex, Blink, Rise Of The Sixth with fantastic rewards, Perfect KBD, Perfect Kalphite Queen,
Perfect Bork, Perfect Dag Kings, Perfect Tormented Demons, All God Wars Bosses Work 100%, Barrelchest, Glacors,
Group Bossing Including Queen Black Dragon, Wyld Wurm, Yk’lagor The Thunderous, Party Demon,
All Dungeons Working Perfect And Filled With Monsters, Huge List Of Slayer Teleports And A Group Of Slayer Masters To Choose From,
A Huge List Of 15 Minigames to pick from Barrows, Fight Kiln, Fight Jad, Clan Wars,
Soul Wars, Duel Arena, Dominion Tower, Fist Of Guthix, Pest Control… And Many More.
Custom Interface To Teleport To Traning Zones From Low Level Zones to High Level Zones, From Easy soloable Bosses To Hard Multi Player Bosses,
PVP Teleports, Donator Zones With Special Shops, Amazing Xp Rates Perfect For Any Pvmer Or Pker, Global Dueling, Duel Anywhere!
